entry.title: [FRA][Billing] - Value-Added Services repayment system
entry.content:
Mar 5, 15:49 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 24/10/2023 12:00 UTC
End time : 05/03/2023 14:49 UTC
Service statusv: Services are working as they should be.

Feb 29, 11:11 UTC
Monitoring - The technical incident was resolved on 08/02.
Tickets that were not counted are gradually being refunded.

Feb 20, 13:47 UTC
Update - Our teams are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Jan 16, 05:49 UTC
Update - Our teams are working tirelessly to resolve this incident once and for all.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Jan 8, 13:22 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are still processing the previous months.
Processing for October and November is now completed.

Jan 5, 16:00 UTC
Update - The processing of past months is in progress, that of October is completed.

Jan 5, 10:57 UTC
Update - Update : Our technical team is working on resolving the billing issue for the month of October 2023.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Dec 15, 13:58 UTC
Update - Update : A fix has been implemented and is now working, next calls will be billed correctly.
The new tickets are good and will be refunded.
As for the tickets that have not been counted since the start of the incident, we are working to reintegrate them, but this is still in progress.

Dec 12, 14:32 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Dec 12, 12:05 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Dec 12, 10:18 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Dec 12, 10:18 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/10/2023 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Customer having french Value-Added Service (+338xxxxxxxx) plugged on OVH Call Queue or OVH Contact Centre Solution have missing calls for payout.
Root cause : Migration on internal routing.
Ongoing actions : Our team are working to fix the issue.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][VoIP] - SMS delivery status incident notification
entry.content:
Mar 5, 15:42 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 23/02/2024 17:15 UTC
End time : 05/03/2024 12:00 UTC
Service impact : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Acknowledgements of receipt have finished being sent since 12:00 UTC 05/03/2024 UTC

Mar 1, 15:42 UTC
Update - Some of the sms affected by the incident have not yet received their acknowledgements of receipt.
Our teams are working to reintegrate the sms whose acknowledgements of receipt are still in error.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Feb 29, 16:06 UTC
Update - Our provider implemented the definitive patch and fixed the issue.
SMS received by the customers have their status updated to delivered.
Our teams are currently working on integrating the delivered status that has not been received.

Feb 29, 10:31 UTC
Update - The patch that has been implemented has considerably reduced the impact and DLRs (delivery reporting) are in the process of being inserted.

Feb 28, 16:26 UTC
Identified - Start time : 23/02/2024 17:15 UTC
Service impact : Customers are receiving SMS but some SMS delivery status is not updated as delivered
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working with our provider to solve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
